Different tune
 




Henrik Zetterberg's Wings make a statement vs. the Flames.  (AP)



    

    

      
      The Red Wings 
      pick apart the Flames to take Game 1 of their series. While 
      Jarome Iginla may talk of a likely upset, Wes Goldstein says this 
      isn't the same gritty Calgary squad we remember taking 
      down Motown back in '04.
    

  
 Related Links:• Rangers finally win a game | Sabres topple Isles | Devils quell Bolts• Chelios sets mark | DiPietro cleared | Playoffs: Bracket | Breakdowns


 


 

 





 Asterisk central: Bonds' chase can make you squirm


    

      
      Pick a date, any date. Barry Bonds closes in on 756, and Scott Miller 
      sets the scene for the slugger's somewhat trivial pursuit 
      of baseball's most prestigious record.
    

  
• Aaron staying away  | Miller: Bull Pennings | Scott!


 

 





 Finding the 'howdunit' in Gillispie's journey to Kentucky


    

      Billy Gillispie's career 
      goes into orbit by going from A&M to Kentucky. But how? 
      Nobody knows for sure, but Gary Parrish has a theory that just 
      happens to fit the facts.
    

  
• Coach changes | Parrish: Billy | Top 26 | Blog | Hey!
